headline: A Fresh Look at United Rentals (URI) Valuation After Wells Fargo’s New “Overweight” Coverage
summary: Wells Fargo has just initiated coverage on United Rentals (URI) with an “Overweight” rating, reinforcing recent positive sentiment from analysts. This move highlights United Rentals’ strategy of expanding its specialty rental capabilities. See our latest analysis for United Rentals. United Rentals has seen a burst of attention from analysts as it continues expanding its specialty rental services, but the share price recently pulled back, recording a 14.9% drop over the past month. Even so,...
